title: Non-Distressed Version?
content:
If somebody wanted a non-distressed version of this  
 [http://www.dafont.com/plane-crash.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140711020230/http:/www.dafont.com/plane-crash.font "http://www.dafont.com/plane-crash.font")  
what would be the closest?

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
**[Coolvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140711020230/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Coolvetica%20-%20Regular&fid=44620fe64734f268ad07740e6ec5127d&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=PLANE%20CRASH&wrap=2)** by Ray Larabie comes quite close if you make it a bit heavier.  
Next best matches: Nimbus Sans or Helvetica but there are a few differences like /R's leg etc.
